reviews.review: Fun whether you're playing competitive with friends, or exploring the vast community servers running custom gamemodes (try ZE btw ;)
Great game would waste 6000 hours on again

-Not too many hackers if you get prime 
-Game is a classic and everyone should play this game at least once

its a good game to sink your life into

This game sucks and I love it but definitely hate it at the same time.
Global offensive är väl kul till en viss del. Man blir lätt less på spelet för de ända man får möta är fuskare sen att man alltid får dåliga lagkamrater också.

So, this game is good. Obviously. But I can't get past the stats. There are much better games. So, I'm going to be comparing this game to a few other similar games in this genre.

1) Graphics: Among us has better graphics so its better

2) Fun Factor: Among us is more fun so its better

3) Gambling: Among us has no gambling so its better

4) FPS: Among us drops NO FPS!!!!!! AMONG US IS BETTER

I MEAN ITS CLEAR TO SEE THAT NOTHING BEATS AMONG US!!!!!!
